text: Joelle Joanie "JoJo" Siwa (; born May 19, 2003) is an American dancer, lip- syncer, actress, and YouTube personality. She is known for appearing for two seasons on Dance Moms"Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition Divas in the House: JoJo Eliminated", November 6, 2013, July 19, 2016 and for her singles "Boomerang" and "Kid in a Candy Store". == Works == Siwa posts daily videos of her life on her YouTube channels, "JoJo Siwa TV" and "It's JoJo Siwa". She was born in Omaha, Nebraska. In June 2019, the FDA issued a warning about dangerous levels of asbestos in a JoJo Siwa-branded cosmetics kit. JoJo signed with Nickelodeon in 2017. She was in the movies Blurt! and Lip Sync Battle Shorties with Nick Cannon. She played on pictionary!. In April 2024, JoJo released a single entitled Karma which she intended to be an adult song, attempting to rebrand from a child star. == Personal life == Siwa came out as being in the LGBTQ+ community in January 2021. In February 2021, she revealed that she was in a relationship with her best friend who had asked her to be her girlfriend a month prior. However they have since separated and Siwa has had several relationships since. == References == Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:American dancers Category:American pop singers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American YouTubers Category:Actors from Omaha, Nebraska Category:Singers from Omaha, Nebraska Category:American TikTokers Category:LGBT dancers Category:LGBT singers Category:LGBT actors Category:American LGBT people Category:American electropop singers Category:Participants in American reality television series
title: JoJo Siwa
